Description: Fiber optic cabling system (single-mode and multi-mode; 800-1500 LM total; fiber counts 12-24; termination and splicing)
Notes: OS2 single-mode for backbone (300-600 LM); OM3/OM4 multi-mode for distribution (500-900 LM); includes cables + connectors + splicing; integrated materials + labor allowance

Description: Fiber optic cable installation and testing (pulling; termination; splicing; OTDR testing)
Notes: Installation labor for fiber infrastructure; includes pathway coordination per DEL-25.01; testing per DEL-25.04

Description: Structured copper cabling system (Cat 6 or Cat 6A; 1500-2500 LM horizontal; 50-100 outlets)
Notes: Cat 6/6A UTP or F/UTP per DEL-25.02; includes horizontal cables + outlet jacks + backbone cables; integrated materials + labor allowance

Description: Structured copper cable installation and testing (pulling; termination; certification testing)
Notes: Installation labor for copper structured cabling; termination at outlets and patch panels; certification per TIA-568; testing per DEL-25.04

Description: Network switches and active equipment (1 core switch + 3-7 access switches; 150-300 total ports)
Notes: Managed switches; 24-48 ports each; VLAN/QoS capable; fiber uplinks; PoE capability TBD (may add 20-40%); includes SFP transceivers

Description: Patch panels (fiber and copper; 8-15 panels total; 24-48 ports each; rack-mounted)
Notes: Fiber patch panels (LC or SC connectors per DEL-25.02); copper patch panels (Cat 6/6A); includes patch cords; 19-inch rack-mount per EIA-310-D

Description: Cable management and infrastructure (J-hooks; labels; grounding; firestopping)
Notes: Cable support hardware; TIA-606 labeling; TIA-607 grounding/bonding; firestopping at penetrations; pathway coordination with PKG-17

Description: Engineering design (drawings; specifications; data sheets; test procedures; 600-800 hours)
Network equipment installation and mounting (rack installation; cable dressing; equipment configuration)
Notes: Switch installation in racks; initial configuration; cable management; coordination with PKG-17 for power; PKG-22 for HVAC

Description: Equipment room and TR infrastructure setup (rack setup; grounding; cable management)
Notes: Equipment room (ER) and telecommunications rooms (TRs) infrastructure; coordinate with PKG-21 layouts and PKG-22 HVAC

Description: Fiber splicing and termination labor (field termination; splice closures; testing)
Notes: Specialized fiber splicing labor; connector termination; splice enclosures; coordinate with outdoor fiber runs

Description: Construction indirects (field supervision; QA/QC; HSE; coordination)
Notes: Factor-based CI = 18% × CD; includes field superintendent; QA/QC; HSE; terminal coordination per A-2514
Factor-based P = 2% × MAT; vendor quote solicitation; equipment inspection; delivery coordination

Description: Project management (EPCM; design coordination; document control)
Notes: Factor-based PM = 6% × (CD+CI+MAT); EPCM allocation; interdisciplinary coordination; document management

Description: Commissioning and integration testing (network testing; integration with PKG-19; performance verification)
Notes: Factor-based COM = 3% × (CD+CI+MAT); fiber/copper testing per DEL-25.04; network commissioning; PKG-19 integration per A-2516

Description: Spare capacity allowance (spare fibers; spare ports; pathway capacity)
Notes: Future expansion capacity per OBJ-8; embedded in cable/panel sizing; no separate equipment; 20-40% spare capacity in infrastructure
